description: p(0)+p(1)+...+p(n-1)-n, where p = partition numbers, A000041.
comments: Number of non-isomorphic rank-2 matroids over S_n.Starting (1, 3, 7, 13,...) = row sums of triangle A171239. [From _Gary W. Adamson_, Dec 05 2009]
links: W. M. B. Dukes, Tables of matroids

maple: a:=n->add(numbpart(k)-1, k=1..n-1): seq(a(n), n=1..41); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 01 2008
